attributes.name: Ice Dance 1
attributes.description:
Ice Dance 1

(Formerly Introduction to Ice Dance)

30 minute class followed by 90 minute Ice Dance session

Open to children, youth and adults

 

Requirements:

Advanced level in the Learn To Skate program; Stroking, forward and backward cross overs, all edges, outside three turns and inside C-turns (Mohawks).

 

Instructors will introduce Ice Dance elements: swing rolls, progressives and chasses. Teach how to read dance diagrams for steps, patterns and timing. Teach the preliminary dances, introduce ice dance timing and expression (ex: tango vs waltz). Teach how to safely participate in Ice Dance practice and training sessions.
